# PM Toolkit

## Summary
PM Toolkit is a free, open-source VS Code/Cursor extension that provides Obsidian-like visual editing tools for product managers.

## Features
- WYSIWYG Markdown Editor with slash commands and templates
- Kanban boards backed by plain markdown files
- File viewers for PDF, Word, Excel, and CSV
- Mermaid diagram rendering

## Installation
- VS Code Marketplace: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=aaronkwhite.pm-toolkit
- Open VSX (Cursor): https://open-vsx.org/extension/aaronkwhite/pm-toolkit

## Links
- GitHub: https://github.com/aaronkwhite/pm-toolkit
- Documentation: https://pmtoolkit.netlify.app/

## Keywords
markdown editor, wysiwyg, kanban board, cursor extension, vscode extension, product manager tools, notion alternative
